comment.author: 41361030@N00
comment._content: I wonder where this is... there's a major theatre along Hirado Sakuragi Dōro (平戸桜木道路) between Sakuragi-chō and Hinode-chō stations, where rakugo and other sorts of traditional performances are held. But whether that theatre is the successor to a previous theatre on the same spot, or whether this photo was taken somewhere else entirely I have no idea.

comment.author: 29528454@N04
comment._content: It is a joy to view these old photos.......Robert

comment.author: 29528454@N04
comment._content: I know, I know, Van Gogh would not have had a camera, but it is all part of this fictional adventure. Let us, then, assume that had Vincent had a camera he would have snapped some great photos. I know I would have.
